name: Connect Toons
description:
A SIMPLE yet VERY ADDICTIVE game.

The game starts out with a 5x5 size board and gets more challenging as the board sizes go up. There are many levels to play! Don’t worry if you get stuck! Hints are available to get you unstuck. The simple and interesting gameplay.

How to Play?
Connect matching characters on the board. Pair all the characters and cover entire board to solve the puzzle. Be careful line will be break if they cross or overlap. Simple and easy ha

Feature Highlights
- Uniquely challenging levels
- 10 different board sizes
- Hints in case you get stuck
- Easy and fun to play but hard to master
- Smooth, polished touch interaction
- Stunning sound & effects
- Colorful UI

In addition to the unlimited play modes, there are timed modes to challenge your speed. See how many matches you can make before time runs out! But you to act quick to finish each level. Put your matching skills to the test with larger boards.

Get the game now to join in the fun!!!
